title: 19: Free Raya Pass ft. John
description:
Have you been trying to get on Raya? Let's go sloots. 
This week, Sofia is reunited with John as he pays a visit back to Utah. John catches us up on his latest antics including his recent move to New York City and a life altering experience that surprisingly changed his life for the better. The duo also recounts a RIDICULOUS Vegas story from their high school days that they definitely shouldn’t have made it out alive from…but luckily for us, they live to tell the tale. 

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
